subject: Transactions in *unit
msgSnippet: Hi all, This is a great list.  I just got on it a few days ago but can already tell how useful it will be. Here s my question for you: are any of you writing
messageBody:
Hi all,

This is a great list. I just got on it a few days ago but can already tell
how useful it will be.

Here's my question for you: are any of you writing tests that require
explicit transaction management in the test code? What's your policy for
handling them? Begin and commit within each test case? Verify expected
results both before and after the commit? Roll back by hand on exceptions?

I'd be especially curious to know if you've made any *unit extensions to
handle the transactions automatically, or even thought much about it.

Thanks a bunch!
Kevin
